TypeSignature.Value: public ref class PrivateComponentAttribute sealed : Attribute
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrivateComponentAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PrivateComponentAttribute Inherits Attribute

Docs.summary: Identifies a component as a private component that is only seen and activated by components in the same application. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/).
